As the others indicate, it's likely (or at least possible) that your
database is rounding the milliseconds to the nearest 1000th. We
experienced this with OJB and an Oracle database - drove us crazy for a
while, because our unit tests were passing locally with HSQLDB, but
failing in the daily build, which used Oracle. Check what datatype
you're using in the DB.

Hope that helps,

John
